about.description:
A pure python package with tools for handling first order and Monte-Carlo
propagation of uncertainty; handles relative, absolute, and expanded
uncertainties of quantities with units.
about.summary: tools for dealing with measured quantities: uncertainty propagation and unit conversion

about.description:
A pure python package with tools for handling first order and Monte-Carlo
propagation of uncertainty; handles relative, absolute, and expanded
uncertainties of quantities with units.
about.summary: tools for dealing with measured quantities: uncertainty propagation and unit conversion

name: metrolopy
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "metrolopy" %}
{% set version = "0.5.7" %}


package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.io/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 63afaab360ef9086705fc0dbda601aaeb0b9298e347906bd099218782d8ecdf2

build:
  number: 0
  noarch: python
  script: {{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv

requirements:
  host:
    - pip
    - python >=3.5
  run:
    - numpy
    - matplotlib
    - pandas
    - python >=3.5
    - scipy

test:
  imports:
    - metrolopy
    - metrolopy.tests
  commands:
    - pip check
  requires:
    - pip

about:
  home: https://nrc-cnrc.github.io/MetroloPy
  summary: 'tools for dealing with measured quantities: uncertainty propagation and unit conversion'
  description: |
    A pure python package with tools for handling first order and Monte-Carlo
    propagation of uncertainty; handles relative, absolute, and expanded
    uncertainties of quantities with units.
  license: GPL-3.0-only
  license_file: metrolopy/license.txt
  doc_url: https://nrc-cnrc.github.io/MetroloPy
  dev_url: https://github.com/nrc-cnrc/Metrolopy

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - hvparks
smithy_version:
No azure token. Create a token and
put it in ~/.conda-smithy/azure.token
3.7.10
